<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pack Stalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=2798) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Pack Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=2794); Expert in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

Ambushes are an honored gnoll tradition. You gain the [Terrain Stalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=852) feat and can extend its effects to a single ally so long as they remain within 10 ft. of you. If you have master proficiency in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15), you can extend the effect to two allies. If you have legendary proficiency in Stealth, you can extend it to four allies.
name: Pack Stalker
